name: Veronica Roth
description:
Every YA dystopian novel series ever:

After some catastrophe... The world seems perfect. Everyone lives in harmony...

But that's not the truth... Something is not right in this world. Something sinister lies beneath...

The protagonist, a young woman/man, starts to question her/his reality. She/he begins to explore alternatives...

The protagonist seeks help. A wise older character helps open up her/his eyes...

The protagonist rises up to fight the power. She/he enlists the help of others to the cause...

The protagonist finds out the truth. The powers that be are not what they seem. The supposed harmony is just a mirage...

A person close to the protagonist dies. She/he is very sad, but continues to fight...

The protagonist topples the powers that be. A new world is ushered in...

The new world is not exactly perfect either...

(Veronica Roth, author of "Divergent": goyishe Polish/German. Not a Jew...)
